p.k: Bear Lift / Lazer Royale / The Perfect Tree / The Limo To help raise money to save Darrell's store, the Bears use the stack as a taxi through a ride share app. / The Baby Bears sign up for a game of laser tag, hoping to win some ice cream. But the round of laser tag turns out to be less of a game and more like a war zone. / Chloe and Ice Bear drive up north to find the perfect Christmas tree. Meanwhile, Grizz and Panda are in charge of decorating Chloe's house. / To help distract Panda from his girl problems, Grizz and Ice Bear treat him to a ride in a limo.
